import React from "react"; import "./About.css"; export const About = () => { return ( <>
About US
This Website is Publised on 6th july 2022 .________ Contributers is Kanha Tiwari and Jay Kumar Pandit , both work in frontend as well as backend .Our ________ contributors work hard, and have dedicated countless hours to build a tool that democratizes publishing.________ is open source software that is both free and priceless.
Our Mission
________ is software designed for resume and to create new ideas and ease to use. We believe great software should work with minimum set up, so you can focus on sharing your story, product, or services freely. The basic ________ software is simple and predictable so you can easily get started. It also offers powerful features for growth and success.
Supporting this idea by Jay kumar Pandit and Kanha Tiwari collaborating on and contributing to this project. The ________ community is welcoming and inclusive. Our contributors’ passion drives the success of ________ which, in turn, helps you reach your goals.
Our Story
________ started in June 2022 by Kanha and Jay many difficulties come but we work hard day by day .The need for an elegant, well-architected personal publishing system was clear even then.________ is Fully MERN Stack we use react for frontend and nodejs for backend and for Database we used MongoDB.
The ________ open source project has evolved in progressive ways over time. ________ provides the opportunity for anyone to create and share post. People with a limited tech experience can use it “out of the box”, and more tech-savvy folks can customize it in remarkable ways.
Bill of Rights
________ is licensed under the ___________________ which provide free licence.Consider this the ________ Bill of Rights:
); };
